alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 7:21AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette, Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 815 AM EDT... At 720 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Obrien to 11 miles north of Cross City to 8 miles north of Steinhatchee. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Steinhatchee, Tennille, Shamrock, Clara, Cross City Airport, Old Town, Guaranto Springs, Jena, Hines, Jonesboro, Grady, Hatch Bend, Eugene, Fletcher, Fletcher Springs and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
